sentences.english: And there's something on that grass that cures that blood disease.
sentences.chinese: 草葉子上面的什麼東西就把她的血液病給治好了。

sentences.english: It is feasible to use the theory of combining with disease and syndrome to treat aged malignant hematonosis.
sentences.chinese: 從病證結合角度治療老年惡性血液病具有一定可行性。

sentences.english: All of these patients were hospitalized because of severe haematological disorders.
sentences.chinese: 所有這些患者均因嚴重的血液病而入院治療。

sentences.english: Objective To inquiry into the malignant blood disease merging superinfection .
sentences.chinese: 目的探討惡性血液病合併二重感染相關情況。

sentences.english: Objective: In order to illustrate the clinic significance of megakaryocytic progenitors in some blood diseases.
sentences.chinese: 核祖細胞體外培養在一些血液病中的臨牀意義。

sentences.english: Patients with hematologic diseases usually receive blood components units that are leukoreduced.
sentences.chinese: 血液病患者注射的血成分都是去白細胞的。

sentences.english: The specialist is researching the disease of the blood.
sentences.chinese: 這位專家正在從事血液病的研究。

sentences.english: Objective To summarize the clinical features of hematonosis in spinal surgery.
sentences.chinese: 目的探討血液病在脊柱外科的臨牀特點。

sentences.english: But which nosohemias often cause these symptoms?
sentences.chinese: 而哪些血液病常引起這些症狀呢？

pinyin: duo1 fa1 xing4 gu3 sui3 liu2
